pullrequest.title: Copy inertia ratio modification fix from pull request #1114 to gazebo_2.2 branch

content.raw:
It looks like some joint and physics tests are [failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/43/testReport/):
~~~
REGRESSION:  PhysicsEngines/PhysicsTest.SphereAtlasLargeError/0

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/physics.cc:1709
Expected: (jointError.pos.GetSquaredLength()) < (1e-2), actual: 0.258364 vs 0.01
~~~
~~~
FAILED:  Joint_TEST.GetForceTorqueWithAppliedForceODE

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint_TEST.cc:396
The difference between wrench_01.body1Force.x and 0.0 is nan, which exceeds 2.0, where
wrench_01.body1Force.x evaluates to nan,
0.0 evaluates to 0, and
2.0 evaluates to 2.
~~~
@hsu We should look into this.

EDIT: joint test has a NaN
content.html:
It looks like some joint and physics tests are failing:

REGRESSION:  PhysicsEngines/PhysicsTest.SphereAtlasLargeError/0

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/physics.cc:1709
Expected: (jointError.pos.GetSquaredLength()) < (1e-2), actual: 0.258364 vs 0.01

FAILED:  Joint_TEST.GetForceTorqueWithAppliedForceODE

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint_TEST.cc:396
The difference between wrench_01.body1Force.x and 0.0 is nan, which exceeds 2.0, where
wrench_01.body1Force.x evaluates to nan,
0.0 evaluates to 0, and
2.0 evaluates to 2.

@hsu We should look into this.

EDIT: joint test has a NaN
